wl:page.title: Counting the cost of mercury pollution | e! Science News

wl:sentence.pos_tags: VBG AT NN IN NN NN

wl:page.wl:sentence: Counting the cost of mercury pollution

wl:sentence.pos_tags: NN NN NP NN CD IN CD IN NN-TL CC-TL NN-TL

wl:page.wl:sentence: Published: Monday, January 7, 2013 - 10:02 in Health & Medicine

wl:sentence.pos_tags: NP NN NN CC NN NP NN

wl:page.wl:sentence: Elsie M Sunderland and Noelle E Selin

wl:sentence.pos_tags: VBG RP NN NN CC VBG NN NN IN AT NN NN NN MD VB AT JJ NN-TL NN CD IN NN VBZ AT JJ NN VBN IN VBD NN$-TL JJ NN NN JJ NN-TL . JJ-TL NNS VB CS IN CD CC CD CD NNS IN AT NN BER VBN DT NN IN NN NNS IN AT JJ NN IN NN CC CD IN AT NN VBN JJ IN NN

wl:page.wl:sentence: Cleaning up mercury pollution and reducing prenatal exposure to the neurotoxin methylmercury (MeHg) could save the European Union €10,000 million per year, finds a new study published in BioMed Central's open access journal Environmental Health . New estimates suggest that between 1.5 and 2 million children in the EU are born each year with MeHg exposures above the safe limit of 0.58µg/g and 200,000 above the WHO recommended maximum of 2.5µg/g.

wl:sentence.pos_tags: CS DTI NN VBZ RB IN AT NN IN NN IN JJ NNS CC NN NN QL BEZ VBN IN VBG NN NN

wl:page.wl:sentence: While some mercury occurs naturally in the environment for example from volcanic eruptions or forest fires, most is generated by burning fossil fuels.

wl:sentence.pos_tags: NN-TL CC JJ NN NN NN NN RB AT JJS NN IN NN IN NNS BEZ IN VBG NN

wl:page.wl:sentence: Marine and fresh water species bioconcentrate MeHg; consequently the main source of exposure for humans is from eating fish.

wl:sentence.pos_tags: AT NN IN NNS IN IN NP VBD AT NN NN IN NN IN JJ NNS TO VB AT NN IN NN IN NN

wl:page.wl:sentence: A team of researchers from across Europe used the DEMOCOPHES study of exposure to environmental chemicals to assess the impact of MeHg on humans.

wl:sentence.pos_tags: NN NNS IN NN NN VBN IN CD JJ NN VBN NN CS AT JJR NN NN NNS BER VBN IN NP VBD IN JJ NNS IN NN

wl:page.wl:sentence: Hair samples of child-mother pairs, collected from 17 European countries, demonstrated that, as a lower estimate, 1,866,000 children are born in Europe exposed to toxic levels of MeHg.

wl:sentence.pos_tags: CD IN DTS BER VBN IN JJ NN CD NNS NN

wl:page.wl:sentence: 232,000 of these are exposed to hazardous levels, five times higher.

wl:sentence.pos_tags: CC * AT NN IN NP BEZ AP IN NN

wl:page.wl:sentence: But not every child in Europe is equally at risk.

wl:sentence.pos_tags: WRB VBN IN NN NNS VBN IN NP CC NP BED AT QL VBN TO VB CC NP AT NN

wl:page.wl:sentence: When analysed per country, children born in Portugal and Spain were the most exposed to MeHg, and Hungary the least.

wl:sentence.pos_tags: NN-HL TO VB IN NNS VBZ NN NN VBG IN AT JJR NN CC RB AT JJR VBG NN

wl:page.wl:sentence: Exposure to MeHg in humans affects brain development, resulting in a lower IQ, and consequently a lower earning potential.

wl:sentence.pos_tags: AT JJ NN NN TO VB MD BE VBN CS NN VBG NN IN NN CS DT NN DOZ * VB IN NN AP NNS IN NN NN CC NNS IN JJ NN IN NN

wl:page.wl:sentence: The long term cost to society can be calculated as lifetime earning loss per person, although this estimate does not take into account other aspects of brain toxicity or risks of cardiovascular disease in adults.

wl:sentence.pos_tags: NN NP NN NN NN PPSS VB AT NNS IN NN IN VBG NNS IN NP-TL NNS RB AT NNS IN VBG NN NN NNS IN CD NP-TL NNS IN NN CC JJ NNS IN NN TO VB CD IN NN IN AT NN IN AT NN

wl:page.wl:sentence: Prof Philippe Grandjean explained, "If we convert the effects of MeHg on developing brains into IQ points then the benefits of controlling MeHg pollution equates to 700,000 IQ points per year and monetary benefits of €8,000 to €9,000 million per year for the whole of the EU.

wl:sentence.pos_tags: NN-HL NN-HL MD RB NN JJ NP NN

wl:page.wl:sentence: Exposure abatement would mainly benefit southern Europe ."

wl:sentence.pos_tags: RB NN BEZ NN PPS VBZ CS AT NN IN NNS IN NN VBG NNS CC AP NN TO RB JJ NNS IN NN

wl:page.wl:sentence: Once MeHg is formed, it cycles though the environment for thousands of years, exposing humans and other species to potentially toxic levels for generations.

wl:sentence.pos_tags: VBG IN AT NN NN NP NN NN VBG AT NN VBN IN NN VBZ NN NN IN NNS CC NN NN

wl:page.wl:sentence: Commenting on the research Dr Elsie Sunderland said, "Mitigating the harm caused by methylmercury requires global-scale cooperation on policies and source reductions.

wl:sentence.pos_tags: NNS IN AT VBN-TL NNS-TL NN NN-TL BER RB RB TO VB NN NN NN

wl:page.wl:sentence: Negotiations by the United Nations Environment Program are currently underway to address mercury emission levels."
